PHRASE.LANG: The crested toad has a distinctive upturned snout and gold eyes. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]

El sapo de cresta tiene un distintivo morro elevado y ojos dorados. [#PMExtraCommerce] [#Legal]
